title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets and plant ideas.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against the machines.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his son.

title: Toy Story
description: Toys come to life and deal with friendship, jealousy, and adventure.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A timid clownfish sets out on a journey to find his missing son.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the damage caused by Thanos.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals band together to save the universe.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while chasing their dreams.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social classes meet and fall in love aboard the Titanic.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of Facebook's founding and the conflicts that followed.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system.

title: Inside Out
description: A young girl's emotions struggle to adapt after she moves to a new city.
